pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.5: 3. The training rule on slapping with the palm of the hand
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.2: two nuns who were plagued by discontent entered their room and slapped their genitals with the palm of their hands.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.3: Hearing the sound, the nuns rushed to and asked them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.4: “Venerables, are you having sex with a man?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.5: “No, we’re not,” and they told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.7: “How can nuns slap their genitals with their hands?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.11: “How can nuns slap their genitals with their hands?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.14.1: ‘If a nun slaps her genitals with the palm of her hand, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.1: Slaps her genitals with the palm of her hand:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.2: if, consenting to the contact, she hits her genitals, even with a lotus leaf, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.4: if she does it because she is ill;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.7: The third training rule is finished.
